description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Mister Jump is a classical retro jump'n'run like Super Mario Bros, Gianna Sisters or Sonic. It consists of 15 levels. If you collect 100 ruby without dying you´ll get an extralife! And now have fun with Mister Jump! If you enjoy retro-games please check out our hit-game "Pacific Wings", which is similar to 1942!

And now have fun with Mister Jump! If you enjoy retro-games please check out our hit-game "Pacific Wings", which is similar to 1942!
